statements: SELECT * FROM investment_portfolio WHERE investment_amount > 1000;
SELECT investment_name, return_amount FROM investment_portfolio WHERE investment_name LIKE 'Tech%';
SELECT portfolio_id, investment_amount FROM investment_portfolio ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;
SELECT investment_name, SUM(investment_amount) AS total_investment FROM investment_portfolio GROUP BY investment_name;
SELECT * FROM investment_portfolio WHERE return_amount IS NULL;
SELECT investment_name, investment_amount FROM investment_portfolio WHERE return_amount > 1000 ORDER BY investment_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM investment_portfolio WHERE return_amount < 5000 ORDER BY investment_name ASC
SELECT investment_name, return_amount FROM investment_portfolio WHERE investment_amount > 50000 ORDER BY investment_name ASC, return_amount DESC
SELECT AVG(investment_amount) AS avg_investment_amount FROM investment_portfolio
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_investments FROM investment_portfolio
SELECT * FROM portfolio;
SELECT portfolio_id, portfolio_name FROM portfolio ORDER BY portfolio_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM investment WHERE investment_amount > 1000;
SELECT investment_name, return_amount FROM investment WHERE portfolio_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT portfolio_name, SUM(investment_amount) AS total_investment FROM portfolio GROUP BY portfolio_name HAVING SUM(investment_amount) > 5000;

SELECT portfolio_name, investment_name, investment_amount FROM portfolio JOIN investment ON portfolio.portfolio_id = investment.portfolio_id WHERE investment.return_amount > 1000 ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;

SELECT portfolio_name, investment_name, investment_amount FROM portfolio JOIN investment ON portfolio.portfolio_id = investment.portfolio_id WHERE investment.return_amount <= 500 ORDER BY investment_name ASC;

SELECT portfolio_id, portfolio_name, SUM(investment_amount) AS total_investment FROM portfolio JOIN investment ON portfolio.portfolio_id = investment.portfolio_id GROUP BY portfolio_id, portfolio_name HAVING total_investment > 5000;
SELECT portfolio_name, investment_name, investment_amount, return_amount FROM portfolio LEFT JOIN investment ON portfolio.portfolio_id = investment.portfolio_id WHERE investment_id IS NULL;

SELECT portfolio_name, investment_name, investment_amount, return_amount FROM portfolio RIGHT JOIN investment ON portfolio.portfolio_id = investment.portfolio_id WHERE portfolio_name LIKE '%Tech%' ORDER BY investment_amount DESC, return_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM investor;
SELECT investor_name FROM investor ORDER BY investor_id DESC;
SELECT investment_name, investment_type FROM investment WHERE investment_amount > 1000;
SELECT portfolio_id, SUM(investment_amount) AS total_investment FROM investment GROUP BY portfolio_id;
SELECT * FROM portfolio JOIN investor ON portfolio.investor_id = investor.investor_id;
SELECT * FROM portfolio WHERE portfolio_id = 1;
SELECT investor_name, investment_name, investment_amount FROM investor INNER JOIN investment ON investor.investor_id = investment.portfolio_id;
SELECT investment_name, investment_type, SUM(investment_amount) AS total_investment FROM investment GROUP BY investment_name, investment_type;
SELECT * FROM portfolio ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;
SELECT investor_name, investment_name, return FROM investor INNER JOIN investment ON investor.investor_id = investment.portfolio_id WHERE return > 0;
SELECT * FROM Portfolio;
SELECT investment_name, amount FROM Investment WHERE return > 0;
SELECT portfolio_name, investment_name, return FROM Portfolio p JOIN Investment i ON p.portfolio_id = i.portfolio_id;
SELECT p.portfolio_id, i.investment_id, c.quantity FROM Portfolio p JOIN PortfolioComposition c ON p.portfolio_id = c.portfolio_id JOIN Investment i ON c.investment_id = i.investment_id;
SELECT AVG(avg_return) AS average_roi FROM ROI WHERE portfolio_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Portfolio;
SELECT * FROM Investment WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT investment_name, amount FROM Investment WHERE return > 5.0 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT p.portfolio_name, i.investment_name, pc.quantity FROM Portfolio p JOIN PortfolioComposition pc ON p.portfolio_id = pc.portfolio_id JOIN Investment i ON pc.investment_id = i.investment_id;
SELECT p.portfolio_name, r.avg_return FROM Portfolio p JOIN ROI r ON p.portfolio_id = r.portfolio_id WHERE r.avg_return < 7.5 ORDER BY r.avg_return ASC;
SELECT * FROM portfolio;
SELECT portfolio_name, creation_date FROM portfolio ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT investment_name, investment_amount FROM investment WHERE investment_amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM transaction WHERE transaction_amount <= 500;
SELECT portfolio_id, COUNT(investment_id) as total_investments FROM portfolio_investment GROUP BY portfolio_id;
SELECT * FROM portfolio;
SELECT * FROM investment WHERE investment_amount > 5000;
SELECT investment_id, investment_name, investment_return FROM investment ORDER BY investment_return DESC;
SELECT portfolio_name, creation_date FROM portfolio WHERE creation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT p.portfolio_name, i.investment_name, t.transaction_date FROM portfolio p JOIN portfolio_investment pi ON p.portfolio_id = pi.portfolio_id JOIN investment i ON pi.investment_id = i.investment_id JOIN transaction t ON i.investment_id = t.investment_id WHERE t.transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY t.transaction_date DESC;
